creator: Desaulniers, Gonzalve Lesieur, 1863-1934. (author)
description: Desaulniers, Gonzalve Lesieur: 1863-1934. // Poetry about the engagement of a detachment of the 65th Battalion Mount-Royal Rifles on May 28, 1885, at Frenchman's Butte during the North-West Rebellion. A list of members of the detachment under command of Lt. Col. G.A. Hughes is given in the introductory pages.
subject: Rebellions and Regimental Histories--Saskatchewan Rebellion
Literary Works--Poetry, French
Poetry, French Canadian
Canadian poetry (French)
Poésie canadienne-française
Riel Rebellion, 1885
Riel, Rébellion de, 1885
title: L'absolution avant la bataille: dédié aux braves de la Butte-aux-Français
